aboutHotel.getPropertyDetailsByHotelIdQuery: query MyQuery($hotelId:String!) { getPropertyDetailsByHotelId(input: {hotelId: $hotelId}) { brand { code createdAt createdBy description groupId gsi1pk gsi1sk id images { fileName index master ratio16to9 ratio1to1 ratio21to9 } name pk sk updatedAt updatedBy version } group { code createdAt createdBy customSenderEmail description firebaseToken id name sk pk updatedAt updatedBy version whiteLabellingConfigurations { appConfigs region userPoolId userPoolWebClientId } } hotel { brandId cancellationPolicy { name type url } checkInTime checkOutTime code covid19Regulations { name type url } createdAt createdBy currency dataProtection { name type url } description devicesEndpoint features groupId gsi1pk gsi1sk gsi2pk gsi2sk id images { fileName index master ratio16to9 ratio1to1 ratio21to9 } information { displayTitle field index type value } interests isDevicesEnabled isUIBuilderEnabled location { addressLine1 addressLine2 area city country latitude longitude postalCode state timezone } maxdevices name phoneNumber pk privacyLaws { name type url } sk starRating termsAndConditions { name type url } travelType updatedAt version updatedBy } } }

thingsToDo.getHotelAmenityDetailsQuery:
query MyQuery($hotelId: String!, $lang: String) {
  getHotelAmenityDetails(input: {hotelId: $hotelId, lang: $lang}) {
    amenities {
      categoryId
      categoryIds
      createdAt
      createdBy
      description
      highlights
      hotelId
      id
      images {
        fileName
        index
        master
        ratio16to9
        ratio1to1
        ratio21to9
      }
      information {
        displayTitle
        field
        index
        type
        value
      }
      isActive
      name
      pk
      sk
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
      version
    }
    categories {
      createdAt
      createdBy
      hotelId
      id
      name
      sk
      pk
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
      version
    }
  }
}
